commands.command: WITH temp ( [ID], [ParentID], Name ) AS ( SELECT [ID] , [ParentID] , Name FROM [dbo].[Group] WHERE [Deleted]=0 AND [ParentID] = @ParentID AND ID=@ID UNION ALL SELECT G.[ID] , G.[ParentID] , G.Name FROM [dbo].[Group] AS G INNER JOIN temp ON G.[ParentID] = temp.[ID] WHERE G.[Deleted]=0 ) SELECT * FROM temp
SELECT TOP 1 [ID] ,[Name] ,[ParentID] ,[Percent] FROM [dbo].[Group] WHERE [Deleted]=0 AND ID=@ID
